0.text: These are hippos. They are sedentary and live most of the time in water. They weigh up to 500 kilograms. They eat grass.

1.text: Those are African buffaloes. They have a body between 2.1 and 3.4 m long. They weigh up to 685 kgs. They are very aggressive animals.

2.text: This is a hyena. It weighs around 50 kilograms, it is stocky and has extremely powerful jaws. Hyenas eat meat.

3.text: That is a hedgehog. It is an amazing mammal, with stiff pointed spines covering its back. They are about 25cm long.
